subject: IES Reader OfflineQueue implemented
body: Implemented OfflineQueue per cross-app sync design: persistent localStorage state with versioning, max 50 ops with oldest eviction, exponential backoff (5s/30s/2min), and saveJourney fallback wiring. Lint run fails on pre-existing warnings in NotesCapture.tsx and useEntityHighlighter.ts (unused var, explicit any).
